wikipedia_page.main: John Walter Ray (born 21 November 1968) is an English former footballer who played in the Football League as a defender for Colchester United.

response: John Ray (1627–1705) was an English naturalist.
John Ray may also refer to:
*John Ray (American football) (1926–2007), American football player and coach
*John Ray (tackle) (born 1969), American football player with the 1993 Indianapolis Colts
*John Ray, Jr., character in the Vladimir Nabokov novel Lolita
